df-ring
blocks.content: Define class of all (unital) rings. A unital ring is a set equipped with two everywhere-defined internal operations, whose first one is an additive group structure and the second one is a multiplicative monoid structure, and where the addition is left- and right-distributive for the multiplication. Definition 1 in [BourbakiAlg1] p. 92 or definition of a ring with identity in part Preliminaries of [Roman] p. 19. So that the additive structure must be abelian (see ~ ringcom ), care must be taken that in the case of a non-unital ring, the commutativity of addition must be postulated and cannot be proved from the other conditions. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-Dec-2014.)

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cur, c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(co(cfv(cur, c0), c3, c1), c1), wceq(co(c1, c3, cfv(cur, c0)), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s0), c3, c1), c1, co(cfv(cur, c0), c3, c1), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(cur, c0)))

blocks.name: ringabl
blocks.content: A ring is an Abelian group. (Contributed by NM, 26-Aug-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm ringabl(class c0) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c0, cabl))
} = {
  isabld(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cplusg, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
  eqidd(cfv(cplusg, c0), wcel(c0, crg))
  ringgrp(c0)
  ringcom(c0, cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, crg))
  diff.hs1.w(wcel(c0, crg))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ringabl(class c0) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà Ring ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Abel)
} = {
  isabld(hs0, hs1, c0, (Base ` c0), (+ ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  eqidd((Base ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  eqidd((+ ` c0), c0 ‚àà Ring)
  ringgrp(c0)
  ringcom(c0, hs0, (Base ` c0), hs1, (+ ` c0))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((+ ` c0))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà Ring)
  diff.hs1.w(c0 ‚àà Ring)
}

blocks.name: ringcmn
blocks.content: A ring is a commutative monoid. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)

blocks.name: ringpropd

blocks.name: crngpropd
blocks.content: If two structures have the same group components (properties), one is a commutative ring iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm crngpropd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c1, ccrg)))

blocks.name: ringprop
blocks.content: If two structures have the same ring components (properties), one is a ring iff the other one is. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ringprop(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg))
  -| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  -| wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c1))
} = {
  mptru(wb(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, crg)))
  ringpropd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  eqidd(cfv(cbs, c0), wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cplusg, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cplusg, c1))
  a1i(wa(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs1))))
  oveqi(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(hs1), cfv(cmulr, c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
}

  oveqi(hs0, (√ó ` c0), hs1, (√ó ` c1))

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.name: iscrngd
blocks.content: Properties that determine a commutative ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm iscrngd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cplusg, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cgrp))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c2, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), c2, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(c4, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c4), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, wcel(c0, ccrg), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cfv(cmgp, c0), ccmn))
  isringd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  iscmnd(s0, s1, cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c3, w0)
  ismndd(s0, s1, s2, cfv(cmgp, c0), c1, c3, c4, w0)
  syl6eq(c1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cbs, c0), w0)
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  syl6eq(c3, cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, c0)), cfv(cmulr, c0), w0)
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmgp, c0), c0)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  iscrng(c0, cfv(cmgp, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, c0))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s1)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmgp, c0)
  diff.cmgp.s(s2)
}

thm iscrngd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà CRing)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c1 =(Base ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 =(+ ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c3 =(√ó ` c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà Grp)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c3]s1)‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1))‚Üí((s0[c3]s1)[c3]s2)=(s0[c3](s1[c3]s2)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1))‚Üí(s0[c3](s1[c2]s2))=((s0[c3]s1)[c2](s0[c3]s2)))
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß(s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2 ‚àà c1))‚Üí((s0[c2]s1)[c3]s2)=((s0[c3]s2)[c2](s1[c3]s2)))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c1)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(c4[c3]s0)= s0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c3]c4)= s0)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s1 ‚àà c1)‚Üí(s0[c3]s1)=(s1[c3]s0))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, c0 ‚àà CRing, c0 ‚àà Ring, (mulGrp ` c0)‚àà CMnd)
  isringd(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  iscmnd(s0, s1, (mulGrp ` c0), c1, c3, w0)
  ismndd(s0, s1, s2, (mulGrp ` c0), c1, c3, c4, w0)
  syl6eq(c1, (Base `(mulGrp ` c0)), (Base ` c0), w0)

  iscrng(c0, (mulGrp ` c0))

  diff.cfv.s(s2, cmgp, c0)

blocks.name: ringlz
blocks.content: The zero of a unital ring is a left-absorbing element. (Contributed by FL, 31-Aug-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm ringlz(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c3))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c0))
} = {
  mpbid(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c3), wceq(co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)))
  3eqtr3d(co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c4, c1), co(c3, c4, c1), wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  oveq1d(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c4, c1, c3, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c3))
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c3), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  mpdan(wcel(c0, cgrp), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c3), wcel(c3, c2))
  grplid(c0, c3, c2, c3, cfv(cplusg, c0))
  syldan(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wceq(co(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1))), w3a(wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2)))
  3jca(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  ringdir(c0, c3, c2, c3, c1, cfv(cplusg, c0), c4)
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2))
  eqcomd(co(c3, c4, c1), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3), wa(wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2)))
  grprid(c0, co(c3, c4, c1), c2, cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)
  syl13anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wb(wceq(co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), co(c3, c4, c1)), co(co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0), c3)), wceq(co(c3, c4, c1), c3)), wcel(c0, cgrp), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  syl3anc(wa(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2)), wcel(co(c3, c4, c1), c2), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  adantr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2))
  syl(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ringgrp(c0)
  grpidcl(c0, c3, c2)
  simpr(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  ringcl(c0, c3, c2, c1, c4)
  grplcan(c0, co(c3, c4, c1), c2, c3, co(c3, c4, c1), cfv(cplusg, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c0))
}

blocks.name: ring1eq0
blocks.content: If one and zero are equal, then any two elements of a ring are equal. Alternately, every ring has one distinct from zero except the zero ring containing the single element ` { 0 } ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2014.)

  eqtr4d(co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), co(c5, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), co(c5, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5)))
  oveq1d(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3, c5, wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5)))

  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5)), wceq(co(c5, cfv(cmulr, c0), c3), c5), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c3, c2))
  ringlz(c0, c3, c2, c5, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2)), wceq(c4, c5)), wceq(co(c4, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), c1), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2))
  simpl2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(c4, c5))
  ringlidm(c0, c1, c2, c4, cfv(cmulr, c0))

  simpl1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wceq(c4, c5))

  simpl2(c0 ‚àà Ring, c1 ‚àà c2, c3 ‚àà c2, c4 = c5)

blocks.name: ringnegl
blocks.content: Negation in a ring is the same as left multiplication by -1. ( ~ rngonegmn1l analog.) (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ringnegl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), cfv(c0, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cmulr, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cminusg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c4))
} = {
  eqcomd(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), cfv(c0, c3), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c3), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3)), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3)), cfv(c0g, c5)))
  3eqtr3rd(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3)), cfv(c0g, c5), co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), c2, c3), co(co(c1, c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3)), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), c2, c3), co(co(c1, c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3))), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  ringdir(c5, c1, c4, cfv(c0, c1), c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), c2)
  eqtrd(co(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), c2, c3), cfv(c0g, c5), co(cfv(c0g, c5), c2, c3), w0)
  oveq1d(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), c2, c3, cfv(c0g, c5), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c1, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0, c1)), cfv(c0g, c5)), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c1, c4))
  grprinv(c5, c1, c4, cfv(cplusg, c5), c0, cfv(c0g, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c0g, c5), c2, c3), cfv(c0g, c5)), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c3, c4))
  ringlz(c5, c3, c4, cfv(c0g, c5), c2)
  oveq1d(co(c1, c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c1, c2, c3), c3), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c3, c4))
  ringlidm(c5, c3, c4, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c0, c3), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3)), wceq(co(c3, cfv(cplusg, c5), co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3)), cfv(c0g, c5))), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4), wcel(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), c4))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), c4), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), c4), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c1, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, crg))
  ringgrp(c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c5, crg))
  ringidcl(c5, c1, c4)
  grpinvcl(c5, c1, c4, c0)
  ringcl(c5, cfv(c0, c1), c4, c3, c2)
  grpinvid1(c5, c3, c4, co(cfv(c0, c1), c2, c3), c0, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0g, c5))

thm ringnegl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3)=(c0 ` c3))

  oveq1d((c1[(+ ` c5)](c0 ` c1)), c2, c3, (0 ` c5), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1[(+ ` c5)](c0 ` c1))=(0 ` c5), c5 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c4)
  grprinv(c5, c1, c4, (+ ` c5), c0, (0 ` c5))
  syl2anc(w0, ((0 ` c5)[c2]c3)=(0 ` c5), c5 ‚àà Ring, c3 ‚àà c4)

  oveq1d((c1[c2]c3), (+ ` c5), ((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3), c3, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c1[c2]c3)= c3, c5 ‚àà Ring, c3 ‚àà c4)
  ringlidm(c5, c3, c4, c1, c2)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0 ` c3)=((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3)‚Üî(c3[(+ ` c5)]((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3))=(0 ` c5)), c5 ‚àà Grp, c3 ‚àà c4, ((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3)‚àà c4)
  syl3anc(w0, ((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3)‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà Ring, (c0 ` c1)‚àà c4, c3 ‚àà c4)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ` c1)‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà Grp, c1 ‚àà c4)
  syl(w0, c5 ‚àà Grp, c5 ‚àà Ring)

  syl(w0, c1 ‚àà c4, c5 ‚àà Ring)

  grpinvcl(c5, c1, c4, c0)
  ringcl(c5, (c0 ` c1), c4, c3, c2)
  grpinvid1(c5, c3, c4, ((c0 ` c1)[c2]c3), c0, (+ ` c5), (0 ` c5))

blocks.name: rngnegr
blocks.content: Negation in a ring is the same as right multiplication by -1. ( ~ rngonegmn1r analog.) (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngnegr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(c2, c0)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c5))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmulr, c5))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cur, c5))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cminusg, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))

  eqcomd(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(c2, c0), w0)
  mpbird(w0, wceq(cfv(c2, c0), co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))), wceq(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), c0), cfv(c0g, c5)))
  3eqtr3rd(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), c0), cfv(c0g, c5), co(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c0, c1, c3)), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c0, c1, c3))), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c4), wcel(c3, c4))
  ringdi(c5, c0, c4, cfv(c2, c3), c3, c1, cfv(cplusg, c5))
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3)), cfv(c0g, c5), co(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c5)), w0)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), cfv(c0g, c5), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(cfv(c2, c3), cfv(cplusg, c5), c3), cfv(c0g, c5)), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4))
  grplinv(c5, c3, c4, c2, cfv(cplusg, c5), cfv(c0g, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, cfv(c0g, c5)), cfv(c0g, c5)), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, c4))
  ringrz(c5, c0, c4, c1, cfv(c0g, c5))
  oveq2d(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), co(c0, c1, c3), c0, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c3), c0), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, c4))
  ringridm(c5, c0, c4, c1, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wceq(cfv(c2, c0), co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3))), wceq(co(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), cfv(cplusg, c5), c0), cfv(c0g, c5))), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c4))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, cfv(c2, c3)), c4), wcel(c5, crg), wcel(c0, c4), wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c4))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(c2, c3), c4), wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c3, c4))
  syl(w0, wcel(c5, cgrp), wcel(c5, crg))
  ringgrp(c5)
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, c4), wcel(c5, crg))

  3eqtr4d((c0[c1](c2[c3]c4)), ((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4)), (c0[c1](c2[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c4))), ((c0[c1]c2)[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)`(c0[c1]c4))), w0)
  eqtrd((c0[c1](c2[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c4))), ((c0[c1]c2)[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)`(c0[c1]c4))), ((c0[c1]c2)[(+ ` c6)](c0[c1]((invg ` c6)` c4))), w0)

  syl2anc(w0, (c2[c3]c4)=(c2[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c4)), c2 ‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà c5)

blocks.name: rngsubdir
blocks.content: Ring multiplication distributes over subtraction. ( ~ subdir analog.) (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 19-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngsubdir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c4), c1, co(c2, c3, c4))))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cbs, c6))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c6))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(csg, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c6, crg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c5))
} = {
  3eqtr4d(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c4), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2)), c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c4), cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), co(c2, c3, c4))), w0)
  eqtrd(co(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2)), c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c4), cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), co(c2, c3, c4))), co(co(c0, c3, c4), cfv(cplusg, c6), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2), c3, c4)), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2)), c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c4), cfv(cplusg, c6), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2), c3, c4))), wcel(c6, crg), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2), c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  syl2anc(w0, wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2), c5), wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c2, c5))
  syl(w0, wcel(c6, cgrp), wcel(c6, crg))
  ringgrp(c6)
  grpinvcl(c6, c2, c5, cfv(cminusg, c6))
  ringdir(c6, c0, c5, cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2), c4, cfv(cplusg, c6), c3)
  oveq2d(co(c0, c3, c4), cfv(cplusg, c6), co(cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2), c3, c4), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), co(c2, c3, c4)), w0)
  ringmneg1(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  oveq1d(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4, co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), c2))), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  grpsubval(c0, c5, c2, c1, cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cminusg, c6), c6)
  syl2anc(w0, wceq(co(co(c0, c3, c4), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(co(c0, c3, c4), cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cfv(cminusg, c6), co(c2, c3, c4)))), wcel(co(c0, c3, c4), c5), wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), c5))
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c3, c4), c5), wcel(c6, crg), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  ringcl(c6, c0, c5, c4, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, wcel(co(c2, c3, c4), c5), wcel(c6, crg), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  ringcl(c6, c2, c5, c4, c3)
  grpsubval(co(c0, c3, c4), c5, co(c2, c3, c4), c1, cfv(cplusg, c6), cfv(cminusg, c6), c6)
  eqid(cfv(cplusg, c6))
  eqid(cfv(cminusg, c6))
}

thm rngsubdir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí((c0[c1]c2)[c3]c4)=((c0[c3]c4)[c1](c2[c3]c4)))
  ‚ä£ c5 =(Base ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(√ó ` c6)
  ‚ä£ c1 =(-g ` c6)

  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c2 ‚àà c5)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà c5)
} = {
  3eqtr4d(((c0[c1]c2)[c3]c4), ((c0[c3]c4)[c1](c2[c3]c4)), ((c0[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c2))[c3]c4), ((c0[c3]c4)[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)`(c2[c3]c4))), w0)
  eqtrd(((c0[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c2))[c3]c4), ((c0[c3]c4)[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)`(c2[c3]c4))), ((c0[c3]c4)[(+ ` c6)](((invg ` c6)` c2)[c3]c4)), w0)
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c2))[c3]c4)=((c0[c3]c4)[(+ ` c6)](((invg ` c6)` c2)[c3]c4)), c6 ‚àà Ring, c0 ‚àà c5, ((invg ` c6)` c2)‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà c5)
  syl2anc(w0, ((invg ` c6)` c2)‚àà c5, c6 ‚àà Grp, c2 ‚àà c5)
  syl(w0, c6 ‚àà Grp, c6 ‚àà Ring)
  ringgrp(c6)
  grpinvcl(c6, c2, c5, (invg ` c6))
  ringdir(c6, c0, c5, ((invg ` c6)` c2), c4, (+ ` c6), c3)
  oveq2d((c0[c3]c4), (+ ` c6), (((invg ` c6)` c2)[c3]c4), ((invg ` c6)`(c2[c3]c4)), w0)
  ringmneg1((invg ` c6), c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0)
  oveq1d((c0[c1]c2), c3, c4, (c0[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c2)), w0)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0[c1]c2)=(c0[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)` c2)), c0 ‚àà c5, c2 ‚àà c5)
  grpsubval(c0, c5, c2, c1, (+ ` c6), (invg ` c6), c6)
  syl2anc(w0, ((c0[c3]c4)[c1](c2[c3]c4))=((c0[c3]c4)[(+ ` c6)]((invg ` c6)`(c2[c3]c4))), (c0[c3]c4)‚àà c5, (c2[c3]c4)‚àà c5)
  syl3anc(w0, (c0[c3]c4)‚àà c5, c6 ‚àà Ring, c0 ‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà c5)
  ringcl(c6, c0, c5, c4, c3)
  syl3anc(w0, (c2[c3]c4)‚àà c5, c6 ‚àà Ring, c2 ‚àà c5, c4 ‚àà c5)
  ringcl(c6, c2, c5, c4, c3)
  grpsubval((c0[c3]c4), c5, (c2[c3]c4), c1, (+ ` c6), (invg ` c6), c6)

  eqid((invg ` c6))

blocks.name: ringn0
blocks.content: Rings exist. (Contributed by AV, 29-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: ringlghm
blocks.content: Left-multiplication in a ring by a fixed element of the ring is a group homomorphism. (It is not usually a ring homomorphism.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: ringrghm
blocks.content: Right-multiplication in a ring by a fixed element of the ring is a group homomorphism. (It is not usually a ring homomorphism.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2015.)

blocks.name: gsummgp0
blocks.content: If one factor in a finite group sum of the multiplicative group of a commutative ring is 0, the whole "sum" (i.e. product) is 0. (Contributed by AV, 3-Jan-2019.)

thm gsummgp0(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí(c0[gsum](s0 ‚àà c1 ‚Ü¶ c2))= c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 =(mulGrp ` c4)
  ‚ä£ c3 =(0 ` c4)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c4 ‚àà CRing)

blocks.name: gsumdixp
blocks.content: Distribute a binary product of sums to a sum of binary products in a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Mar-2015.) (Revised by AV, 10-Jul-2019.)

blocks.name: prdsmgp
blocks.content: The multiplicative monoid of a product is the product of the multiplicative monoids of the factors. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm prdsmgp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c3, cprds, c4))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cmgp, c2))
  -| wceq(c1, co(c3, cprds, ccom(cmgp, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, c6))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wfn(c4, c5))
} = {
  jca(w0, wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wceq(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1)))
  syl5eqr(cfv(cplusg, c0), cfv(cplusg, c1), cfv(cmulr, c2), w0)
  mgpplusg(cfv(cmulr, c2), c0, c2)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cmulr, c2), cfv(cplusg, c1), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cmpt(hs2, c5, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), cmpo(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), cmpt(hs2, c5, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), w0)
  mpoeq123dv(hs0, hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0), cmpt(hs2, c5, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), cmpt(hs2, c5, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), w0)
  3eqtr4d(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c1), cixp(hs0, c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), cixp(hs0, c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs0)))), w0)
  ixpeq2dva(hs0, c5, cfv(cbs, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs0))), w0)
  syl5eq(cfv(cbs, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs0))), cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  mgpbas(cfv(cbs, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cfv(cmgp, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))))
  fveq2d(cbs, cfv(cmgp, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  eqcomd(cfv(cmgp, cfv(c4, cv(hs0))), cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5)))
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs0)), cfv(cmgp, cfv(c4, cv(hs0)))), wfn(c4, c5))
  fvco2(c4, c5, cv(hs0), cmgp)
  prdsbas2(hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), c5, c4, c2, c3, c7, c6, w0)
  prdsbas2(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1), c5, ccom(cmgp, c4), c1, c3, c7, c6, w0)
  mpteq2dva(hs2, c5, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), w0)
  oveqd(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(c4, cv(hs2))), cfv(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cfv(cplusg, cfv(ccom(cmgp, c4), cv(hs2))), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), c5)))

blocks.name: qusring2
blocks.content: The quotient structure of a ring is a ring. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Jun-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm qusring2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wa(wcel(c0, crg), wceq(cec(c1, c2), cfv(cur, c0))))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, co(c3, cqus, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cfv(cbs, c3)))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(cplusg, c3))
  -| wceq(c6, cfv(cmulr, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wer(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s3))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2)), c2, co(cv(s1), c5, cv(s3)))))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s2), c2, cv(s3))), wbr(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s2)), c2, co(cv(s1), c6, cv(s3)))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, crg))

blocks.name: crngbinom
blocks.content: The binomial theorem for commutative rings (special case of ~ csrgbinom ): ` ( A + B ) ^ N ` is the sum from ` k = 0 ` to ` N ` of ` ( N _C k ) x. ( ( A ^ k ) x. ( B ^ ( N - k ) ) ` . (Contributed by AV, 24-Aug-2019.)

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
